entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:37 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 1:37 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
